content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 46}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=40.0, y=-82.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 19}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=45.0, y=-83.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 10}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=42.0, y=-81.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 14}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=45.0, y=-80.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 17}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=40.0, y=-79.0))

### Lab
Consists of lab at position with lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Electricity distribution
Consists of small-electric-pole at positions (x=8.5, y=9.5), (x=4.5, y=5.5), (x=2.5, y=2.5), (x=2.5, y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
### Errors when harvesting resources
-  Make sure the inventory is not full before harvesting resources
### Errors when refueling entities
-  Ensure the entity's fuel source is not full before refueling
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before placing a new entity
### Errors when using extract_item function
-  Make sure coal is available in the inventory before attempting to extract it
### Errors when using harvest_resource function
-  Ensure the inventory is not full before harvesting resources
### Errors when using refuel function
-  Ensure the entity's fuel source is not full before refueling
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
